feed.title: Red Hat Communities of Practice
feed.subtitle: We are a community of Red Hatters committed to levelling up our skillsets and the skillsets of our partners and customers through open source practices.

entry.title: We are the Red Hat CoPs!

link.title: We are the Red Hat CoPs!

entry.content:
Welcome, glad to have you! This first post is an overview of the Red Hat CoPs.

Red Hat Technical Communities of Practice (CoPs) are internal, global communities comprised of all roles across Red Hat collaborating and sharing best practices to promote adoption and enablement of Red Hat products and solutions, while ensuring customer excellence throughout delivery.
entry.summary: Welcome, glad to have you! This first post is an overview of the Red Hat CoPs.
